Subject: Request for Ubuntu 19.04 Installer and All Available Linux Package Download Links
Description:
Hello Team,

We are currently preparing an environment that requires support for Ubuntu 19.04. Could you please share the installer compatible with this OS version?

Additionally, we would appreciate it if you could provide download links for all the available Linux packages, so we can evaluate and select the most suitable one for our setup.

Please let me know if any further details are required from our side.
What_We_Know__c:
- asked on confirmation if they need the installers for the client
- asked who he customer is
- I received the details about the customer - Devansys
- sent the customer the links to the latest EPP clients for Linux distros
- let the customer know that we don;t have a client for Ubuntu 19.04, because it's not supported anymore since 2020
